column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man drove a Lexus RX400h with license plate Phnom Penh 2AK9165 at high speed and hit a road barrier
column4: causing the car to overturn. This case occurred along Street 271 in Sangkat Phsar Doeum Thkov
column7: 2020.------The driver then escaped in an Indian style tuk tuk.------After the incident
column8: the local police arrived at the scene and contacted the road traffic police. Phnom Penh Municipal Police  came down to take the vehicle and stored it to wait for the legal settlement. ------RASMEI
